verbs.description: President Trump [V: is] holding his first state dinner for French President Emmanuel Macron , and Democrats and the media are not invited .
[ARG0: President Trump] is [V: holding] [ARG1: his first state dinner for French President Emmanuel Macron] , and Democrats and the media are not invited .
President Trump is holding his first state dinner for French President Emmanuel Macron , and [ARG1: Democrats and the media] [V: are] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: invited] .
President Trump is holding his first state dinner for French President Emmanuel Macron , and [ARG1: Democrats and the media] are [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: invited] .
